de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

Class BestOfMultipleKMeans<V extends NumberVector<?>,D extends Distance<?>,M extends MeanModel<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<Clustering<M>>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.BestOfMultipleKMeans<V,D,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type
    D - Distance type
    M - Model type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, ClusteringAlgorithm<Clustering<M>>, KMeans<V,D,M>, DistanceBasedAlgorithm<V,D>, Parameterizable

    public class BestOfMultipleKMeans<V extends NumberVector<?>,D extends Distance<?>,M extends MeanModel<V>>
extends AbstractAlgorithm<Clustering<M>>
implements KMeans<V,D,M>
    Run K-Means multiple times, and keep the best run.
